imagetweaks-beta-preference-label:
Used on [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as the label for the checkbox to enable the image editor.
imagetweaks-beta-preference-desc:
Used on [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as the description for the checkbox to enable the image editor.
imagetweaks-beta-preference-info-link:
{{notranslate}}
Used on [[Special:Preferences]] as a link to a page where users can learn about the image editor.
imagetweaks-beta-preference-disc-link:
{{notranslate}}
Used on [[Special:Preferences]] as a link to a page where users can discuss the image editor.
imagetweaks-editor-open: Button for opening an interface for visually editing an image on-wiki.
imagetweaks-editor-save:
Starts the save process for an edited image.
{{Identical|Save}}
imagetweaks-editor-undo:
Undoes an action in the image editor.
{{Identical|Undo}}
imagetweaks-editor-redo:
If a user undoes an action in the image editor, this button re-applies the change.
{{Identical|Redo}}
imagetweaks-editor-rotate-cc: Button for rotating an image 90°, counter-clockwise, in the image editor.
imagetweaks-editor-rotate-c: Button for rotating an image 90°, clockwise, in the image editor.
imagetweaks-editor-flip-v: Button for flipping an image vertically (over the X axis) in the image editor.
imagetweaks-editor-flip-h: Button for flipping an image horizontally (over the Y axis) in the image editor.
imagetweaks-editor-crop:
Opens a cropping interface in the image editor.
{{Identical|Crop}}
imagetweaks-editor-crop-button:
Finishes a crop in the image editor.
{{Identical|Crop}}
imagetweaks-editor-cancel:
Cancels an interactive editing action, like cropping.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
